item.title: Unlock the Secret to Easily Forward Calls on Your Verizon iPhone 7 Plus!
item.description: Introduction Are you a Verizon customer with an iPhone 7 Plus and want to know how to easily forward calls? If so, you’ve come to the right place! In this blog post, we will explain what call forwarding is, its benefits, and how to forward calls on your Verizon iPhone 7 Plus. What is Call Forwarding? Call forwarding is a feature that allows you to forward incoming calls from your phone to another phone number.
